Trade/Device Name(s): On Call Vivid Blood Glucose Monitoring System
On Call Vivid Blood Glucose Meter
On Call Vivid Blood Glucose Test Strips
On Call Vivid Glucose Control Solution
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): On Call Vivid Blood Glucose Meter
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for ACON On Call Vivid Blood Glucose Monitoring System using electrochemical enzymatic assay for quantitative glucose detection in capillary whole blood
Indications for Use Summary: Electrochemical assay for quantitative detection of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertip, forearm, and palm by diabetic patients for home monitoring; not for diagnosis or screening of diabetes or neonatal use; single-patient use only
